description: [RAPIDPULSE](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1113) has the ability to RC4 encrypt and base64 encode decrypted files on compromised servers prior to writing them to stdout.(Citation: Mandiant Pulse Secure Update May 2021)

external_references.description: Perez, D. et al. (2021, May 27). Re-Checking Your Pulse: Updates on Chinese APT Actors Compromising Pulse Secure VPN Devices. Retrieved February 5, 2024.
